title: ArtyTorrent Pack 86-BFA Rush-Construction Kit Loops-WAV samples
description:
ArtyTorrent Pack 86-BFA Rush-Construction Kit Loops-WAV samples
---------------------------------------------------------------

"Rush" is a massive sample collection from Big Fish Audio, containing loops and samples for progressive house and trance. <a href="
http://www.bigfishaudio.com/4dcgi/detailDemos.html?1167" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.bigfishaudio.com/4dcgi/detailDemos.html?1167</a>

This torrent pack contains just the construction kit section, which I&#039;ve re-organised into categories to promote easier mixing and matching with your current sample libraries. Some of the loops are over 30 seconds long, featuring filtering and variations. Tempos range from 132-140 bpm.

Torrent contains 15 RAR files with 233 samples
----------------------------------------------
Bass Loops (27)
Chords Loops (6)
Clap Loops (15)
Cymbal Loops (25)
Drum Loops (22)
Hi-Hat Loops (23)
Kick loops (14)
Pad Loops (5)
Perc Loops (17)
SFX loops (8)
Shaker Loops (9)
Snare Loops (5)
String Loops (2)
Sweeps Loops (9)
Synth Loops (46)

The construction kits did not have names, but are filed according to number, musical key and tempo. So, "08 Amin Kick 135" (a 4/4 kick drum loop) originally went together with "08 Amin Bass 135", but can actually be used with any loop of the same tempo, since drums are not pitched in particular keys.

All files are normalized and acidized 16-bit WAVs at 44.1KHz. 

--
Arty - "Rushing Roulette"

P.S. If you find one of my torrents useful, please vote for it by clicking on the + sign above. It helps me know what sort of packs are most popular.
